scenes.description: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame performs the song 'Watashi no Koi wa Hotchkiss' (My Love is a Stapler) while playing the guitar.
MC section where Elizabeth thanks the audience and jokes about her air guitar skills.
Elizabeth introduces her dog mascot, Bobby, to the stage.
Merchandise announcement featuring a Paper Knife and Acrylic Stand based on the sword 'Thorn'.
Final MC section where Elizabeth thanks the staff and fans before preparing for the final song.

subtitles.original: Wooh!
subtitles.english: Wooh!

subtitles.original: And that was "My Love is a Stapler"!
subtitles.english: And that was "My Love is a Stapler"!

subtitles.original: How was it? Did you like my guitar playing?
subtitles.english: How was it? Did you like my guitar playing?

subtitles.original: Oi! Well, you guys didn't know this,
subtitles.english: Oi! Well, you guys didn't know this,

subtitles.original: but I'm actually a professional air guitarist.
subtitles.english: but I'm actually a professional air guitarist.

subtitles.original: I know, I know. Surprise, shocker.
subtitles.english: I know, I know. Surprise, shocker.

subtitles.original: Professional air guitarist here. Look out!
subtitles.english: Professional air guitarist here. Look out!

subtitles.original: Anywho, now it's time for an announcement!
subtitles.english: Anywho, now it's time for an announcement!

subtitles.original: Everyone, let's call for our favorite four-legged friend, Bobby!
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's call for our favorite four-legged friend, Bobby!

subtitles.original: 3, 2, 1, Bobby!
subtitles.english: 3, 2, 1, Bobby!

subtitles.original: Come here Bobby, you're such a good boy.
subtitles.english: Come here Bobby, you're such a good boy.

subtitles.original: Yes, you're a good boy. Yeah,
subtitles.english: Yes, you're a good boy. Yeah,

subtitles.original: show yourself to the camera, do a little twirl or something, yeah.
subtitles.english: show yourself to the camera, do a little twirl or something, yeah.

subtitles.original: Oh, you're so cute.
subtitles.english: Oh, you're so cute.

subtitles.original: Wait a minute! What the freak?
subtitles.english: Wait a minute! What the freak?

subtitles.original: Bobby!
subtitles.english: Bobby!

subtitles.original: We should... come here, come here, come here.
subtitles.english: We should... come here, come here, come here.

subtitles.original: Up you get.
subtitles.english: Up you get.

subtitles.original: Oh, he's such a little cheeky guy. Little cheeky guy.
subtitles.english: Oh, he's such a little cheeky guy. Little cheeky guy.

subtitles.original: Oh golly.
subtitles.english: Oh golly.

subtitles.original: Well, as you can see on Bobby's head,
subtitles.english: Well, as you can see on Bobby's head,

subtitles.original: the announcement is merchandise!
subtitles.english: the announcement is merchandise!

subtitles.original: Oh my goodness, we have this!
subtitles.english: Oh my goodness, we have this!

subtitles.original: Ba-ba-da-daa!
subtitles.english: Ba-ba-da-daa!

subtitles.original: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame Paper Knife & Acrylic Stand
subtitles.english: Elizabeth Rose Bloodflame Paper Knife & Acrylic Stand

subtitles.original: Wow! A paper knife letter opener inspired by my sword, Thorn.
subtitles.english: Wow! A paper knife letter opener inspired by my sword, Thorn.

subtitles.original: A set product that includes an acrylic stand
subtitles.english: A set product that includes an acrylic stand

subtitles.original: where you can plop your mini Thorn into.
subtitles.english: where you can plop your mini Thorn into.

subtitles.original: It looks real cool on your desk and you'll get all the maidens.
subtitles.english: It looks real cool on your desk and you'll get all the maidens.

subtitles.original: I should know, a lot of them have visited my dressing room to see the prototype.
subtitles.english: I should know, a lot of them have visited my dressing room to see the prototype.

subtitles.original: And that's no lie, it's pretty awesome.
subtitles.english: And that's no lie, it's pretty awesome.

subtitles.original: And also, the sales date will be after the Justice collaboration stream.
subtitles.english: And also, the sales date will be after the Justice collaboration stream.

subtitles.original: So once that's all done and dusted, it'll be out there on the shop.
subtitles.english: So once that's all done and dusted, it'll be out there on the shop.

subtitles.original: And that concludes the merchandise. Thank you Bobby!
subtitles.english: And that concludes the merchandise. Thank you Bobby!

subtitles.original: Everybody thank Bobby! Thank you Bobby!
subtitles.english: Everybody thank Bobby! Thank you Bobby!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much! You're such a good boy,
subtitles.english: Thank you so much! You're such a good boy,

subtitles.original: you're such a good boy, yes you are, you are, you are!
subtitles.english: you're such a good boy, yes you are, you are, you are!

subtitles.original: Alright, back to the Duke and the Queen Mother you go.
subtitles.english: Alright, back to the Duke and the Queen Mother you go.

subtitles.original: Oh gosh, I honestly can't believe it. Time has flown.
subtitles.english: Oh gosh, I honestly can't believe it. Time has flown.

subtitles.original: And it's already time for our last final seventh song, "Symphony"!
subtitles.english: And it's already time for our last final seventh song, "Symphony"!

subtitles.original: This has been quite the journey and a half,
subtitles.english: This has been quite the journey and a half,

subtitles.original: so before I end, I just want to thank everyone.
subtitles.english: so before I end, I just want to thank everyone.

subtitles.original: The cast, our wonderful guests, the crew, managers, the director.
subtitles.english: The cast, our wonderful guests, the crew, managers, the director.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much. Thank you for your hard work.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much. Thank you for your hard work.

subtitles.original: Thank you, thank you so much.
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you so much.

subtitles.original: And of course, my friends, my family, my beautiful kingdom.
subtitles.english: And of course, my friends, my family, my beautiful kingdom.

subtitles.original: Thanks for supporting me so much. I wouldn't be standing here right now.
subtitles.english: Thanks for supporting me so much. I wouldn't be standing here right now.

subtitles.original: Not only do I get to fight for justice,
subtitles.english: Not only do I get to fight for justice,

subtitles.original: but with my wonderful girlies, Raora, Gigi...
subtitles.english: but with my wonderful girlies, Raora, Gigi...
